briefdescription.para: Check if a variable is an integer array.

simplesect.para: True if the variable is an integer array, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the value of a specific index in an integer array variable.

simplesect.para: The value at the specified index.

briefdescription.para: Dimension a new integer array with the specified size.

Handle the DIM statement to define the size of an array.
Handle the REDIM statement to resize an existing array.
